alert.note: Alert for Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 2:42AM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation changing to light to moderate snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Phelps and Kearney Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Plan on extremely hazardous road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation will quickly change over to mostly snow early this morning. While additional significant ice accumulations are not expected, the snow falling on top of already accumulated ice will combine to produce hazardous travel conditions. Also, persistent gusty northwest winds through all of today will likely cause power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
